cab.content: V iv" MHThis Doc......... ilL!^.J;2 j^ o perty of,TbT Secret-1153111rom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,13th November 1919.(Received 14tli, 10 a.m.)15339. 13th November, Malieson telegraphs 9th November repeating Teheran,Kaskgar, ( ^corrupt groupsj Baghdad and Constantinople. " Following telegram received from Bajgiran to-day. Kizil Arvat front remains unchanged. Bolshevikshave now 15,000 troops between Kizil Arvat and Askabad, and it is said that force isto be increased up to 40.000 hy reinforcements from Orenburg side as the earlycapture of Krasnovodsk is considered imperative. Elaborate arrangements are being-made at Askabad for the accommodation of the expected reinforcements."0.
